original_title: Xizang to inject additional expenditure into livelihood projects
article_summary: Xizang Autonomous Region to invest an additional 2 billion yuan in 10 new livelihood projects, focusing on income support, childcare, elderly care, and healthcare improvements, with key policies including free neonatal insurance and winter heating subsidies for low-income households. The region has prioritized public welfare, with over 80% of annual fiscal expenditure directed towards it since 2021.</s>
